name: Phoenix Hatchling
languages: Understands Common and Ignan but can't speak

traits.name: Blazing Feathers
traits.desc: The feathers that cover the phoenix's body are constantly ablaze. These flames shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. Additionally, a creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 2 (1d4) fire damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The phoenix doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The phoenix has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The phoenix makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.
